Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: This is a potential use case, but we encourage people to unleash their creativity and do even more. We want people and brands to engage in a more complex mission and only after the item has been purchased, they'll mark it as complete and get their bonus. So the platform will not be focused on: click this and get money, but instead on: accept this challenge, enjoy the ride and get rewarded for a great job done.

Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: THE GAME CHANGER   Join Impetus One - We're disrupting brand to consumer interaction through mission-based advertising (Pay Per Mission - PPM)   We believe it‚Äôs time to let go of the hype and hope and truly disrupt the way we all experience advertising. Impetus One is a revolutionary advertising engine that allows advertisers and publishers to reward their customers based on a mission completion principle.    Quick overview  Whitepaper Lightpaper  Impetus One is an online advertising platform that offers brands direct means of interaction with their customers by providing crypto rewards for fulfilling their life goals. The brands no longer need to spend their budgets on inefficient ad-campaigns that offer little to no real interaction with their customers. Brands can choose to directly engage with their communities by providing rewards for completing missions in line with people‚Äôs life goals.  Impetus One is replacing Pay Per Click (PPC) with Pay Per Mission (PPM): a unique concept to the online advertising industry.    In simple words: the brand sets out what the customer needs to do, and the customer gets rewarded when completing the mission. Both parties interact and develop a special bond. This is how brand loyalty and emotional attachment is fostered. The more creative and customer-oriented the missions are, the higher the quality of interaction and chances for the mission to be completed.  Impetus One is being developed by a team of serial entrepreneurs. Our achievements so far:  Several exits to date Existing businesses in online advertising, online sales, real estate and payments Members of the diplomatic corps PHDs in behavioral economics National Security Advisors Security experts that work for the European Parliament    TEAM  How does Impetus One work?  1. Loading the ad details - AI-powered recommendations Registered advertisers (brands) will load campaign details into the web app and choose the audience they want to reach, based on AI suggestions made by the platform. Starting from the parameters we are able to track (location, speed, weather, number of steps, time, calories burn), advertisers will decide on mission fulfillment criteria.  2. Request review Online reviewers, will be requested to review new ads, which will be validated based on a consensus mechanism.  3. Review results Ads can be accepted or rejected. Accepted ads are automatically fed to selected publishers. For rejected ads, reviewers will be able to see why the ad was rejected and adapt it according to our guidelines. Reviewers will be remunerated, regardless of the outcome of the review process. For rejected ad campaigns, advertisers will be charged $1 for resubmission.  4. Ad campaign publishing The platform starts pushing the ads to selected publishers through the Impetus code snippet. The system, based on AI algorithms, will match the campaigns with the best publishers.  5. Ad impressions Users are being served the ads in the layout space selected by the publisher. The AI system will collect data through our code snippet, and adjust impression rates based on user behavior. The user will also be able to tweak ad types and categories through his in-app control panel.  6. User mission enrollement When tapping an ad, a landing page generated from the campaign data will be displayed in a Webview Window for mobile devices or through a web page redirect for desktop computers. On this page, the user will be able to join the mission.  7. Enrollement confirmation The publisher app is notified of the customer enrolment, and the app starts tracking the required parameters. When the mission fulfillment criteria are met, the publisher app notifies the platform, and the platform marks the mission completed for the specified user.  8. Advertiser mission charge After successful mission completion, the advertiser is being charged the mission cost, consisting of the mission bounty, publisher revenue, and platform revenue. Advertisers will be charged less frequently, once they have a positive payment history in the platform. 90% of the amount charged from the advertiser, will be used to buy Impetus One coins from our reserve, to be used to reward platform participants.  9. Revenue distribution According to the mission settings, the blockchain smart contract is triggered and the user‚Äôs and publisher‚Äôs rewards will be transferred to their wallets, in Impetus One, at the fixed platform rate.  10. Cashouts Platform participants will be able to sell their coins back into the platform or transfer them to external exchanges.  Roadmap    What's in it for you    Connect with us Telegram: https://t.me/ImpetusOne

Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: The pains we solve    NUDGE: THE IMPETUS ONE TOKEN  ¬ª ERC20 token will be the only currency available in the Impetus ecosystem. ¬ª All funds received by the platform from advertisers will be converted to NUDGE token. ¬ª As we push our token to a new, untapped market of individuals, we are creating the demand for business owners to accept Impetus payments to access them.  image hosting no register  THE IN   ¬ª All advertiser funds are exchanged to NUDGE tokens. ¬ª Impetus app users will be able to exchange FIAT from their banking card directly to Impetus.  THE OUT   ¬ª All NUDGE tokens leaving the platform will be transacted at our exchange. ¬ª Liquidity for cash outs will be provided by advertising income and exchange transactions.  CASH OUTS   Users will be able to sell Impetus tokens received from the platform, at the fixed platform price. The platform will either do a matching between customer cash outs and advertisers spendings, or buy the tokens directly from the user at the fixed platform price.  IMPETUS ONE TOKEN ACQUISITION   The Impetus One platform will use the revenue obtained as publisher, through it‚Äôs own apps (Impetus App, Impetus Go and Impetus KPI) to purchase NUDGE tokens off the free market, up to a maximum price of $0.90. This tokens will be added to the NUDGE token reserve, to be sold at the platform fixed price, whenever needed.  The pre-sale will start soon.   Those who are willing to contribute more than 10 ETH, can subscribe to our presale by using the form available at https://tokensale.impetus.one.   Join our Telegram community for more on this subject: token acquisition, platform exchange rate and loads of talks. There's an entire community waiting for you! https://t.me/ImpetusOne

Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: ZILLIQA, the next-generation high throughput blockchain platform, joins Impetus One as a PARTNER!  Zilliqa is designed to scale to thousands of transactions per second. It brings the theory of sharding to practice with its novel protocol that increases transaction rates as its network expands. The platform is tailored towards enabling secure data-driven decentralised apps, designed to meet the scaling requirements of machine learning and financial algorithms.  READ MORE IN THIS BLOGPOST!

Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: Impetus welcomes a new team member: Scott Stewart, Chief Financial Officer   We introduce you our amazing CFO, Scott Stewart, who recently joined us on this epic journey.  Impetus has a challenging but extraordinary mission to accomplish, and that calls for an outstanding team that can bring our vision into reality.   Discover more about us in this blogpost.

Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: Brian Cugelman, Ph.D, Behavioral Science, Data Science & Digital Media joins Impetus as an Advisor  An important part of our vision of disrupting advertising is empowering people. We have an awesome team and extraordinary advisors helping us achieve that.  One of them is Brian Cugelman, Ph.D. and one of the best when it comes to Behavioral Science, Data Science & Digital Media. Brian is a specialist in applying psychology to interactive media, whether it‚Äôs websites, digital campaigns, tech projects or predictive algorithms.  Find out more about his background in this blogpost.

Author: Impetus.One
Title: [ANN] Impetus One: Blockchain disrupts online advertising
Body: The Impetus One platform is built for brands to be able to pay on a Pay Per Mission concept as we've explained, but we will allow brands/publishers to use the PayPerLead or PayPerSale model as well. PPC is something we don't want to implement though as it's something that we know for fact it's not working anymore. So our main goal is to emphasize why brands/publishers need to step away from this model and use a platform that is genuinely performance only oriented.
